view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUIView

    public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing game view.
    Author:
    Stanislav Smatana, Dominika Fabcinova

        public View(Model m,
    TurnListener tl,
    ControlsListener cl)
        Constructor sets model and event listeners.
        Parameters:
        m - Model of game to use.
        tl - Listener for turn events.
        cl - Listener for other gui-releated events. See ControlsListener interface for more info.
